heroSection.callToAction: Trust the experts at Harris County Plumbing for all your plumbing needs.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jordan Hubbard
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Easy to talk with, and very nice. He told me he would be there between 4-6 PM because he had some folks ahead of me. He even was nice enough to tell me he would get there quicker if need be because he knew we had to get back on the road. Then, he didn't show. I reached out and no response. Tried again, no response. Life happens, I get that. But don't waste folks time. Just be honest. Instead, I waited all afternoon and could have found someone else in the time I waited. (I called around 9AM that day.)
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Dalvin Tucker
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Didn't answer the phone and didn't call back.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Marcus Johnson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Had a service call with them and they never showed up and would not answer any phone calls.  The following Monday called and the guy was supposed to check to see why the service call wasn't made and never called back and again would not answer the phone. Not a way to run a business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: You never had a service call scheduled with us. We have never even spoken before and Your home warranty company put you on my schedule and didn’t follow it up. Not my issue. Maybe call a plumber direct next time you have a plumbing issue.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Bridget Kessler
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I always cringe when I have to call someone I’m not familiar with, but we were very happy our service. He fixed the problem quickly, and we thought the price was reasonable. I’m hoping I don’t need a plumber again anytime soon, but if I do, I would definitely call Harris County Plumbing again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ida Fitzpatrick
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Parker Tent is respectful and honest.He explained everything he did step by step.He was also on time and very professional.He took his time and did not rush even though it was a Sunday afternoon.He made sure the job was done to my satisfaction..
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Nekita Harvey
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very, very unprofessional and unreliable. I'm assuming most of the reviews are from family members and/or friends.  Some of the pictures on their website appear to be from Pinterest.  I reached out to this company after researching plumbers in the Harris County area.  The guy came out and assessed the issue but stated he would need to come back the following day to repair the damages.  He stated he would be back at 2:30 p.m. I missed two hours of work to meet him at the house.  Needless to say, he never showed up nor did he call to say he couldn't make it.  I called the following morning to find out what happened but when the gentleman answered the phone and realized it was me, he hung up.  I should have known something was fishy about him when the water restoration company didn't know his company and they were from Harris County.  I learned that just because a company have a website doesn't mean they are about business.  Poor service!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kit Brown
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: 100% JOB PERFECTION... Identified, Assessed and Solved. HCP will be the only one I call for plumbing for now on. NUFF SAID...
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Danielle B. Scandrick
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Parker did a great job fixing my kitchen sink. I'd definitely refer him to friends and family. His prices were fair as well.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer B
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: The technician was punctual and professional. Answered all questions. We will use for all plumbing needs in the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Captain Money
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Honest and professional plumber! It feels good when you finally find someone who is good at something and you can rely on them.  For plumbing its Harris County Plumbing for me from now on. Highly recommended. Thanks man.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jeffrey Olson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Outstanding service!  My water main sprung a leak my side of the meter.  I was desperate to get the problem repaired and water restored to my house.  The gentlemen that runs this business was the only person I could get a hold of in the area that could fix the problem the same day.  While he had to come out later in the evening due to previously scheduled jobs, he had my water main fixed and water restored to my house by  9:00 P.M.  Incredibly helpful and friendly.  I would definitely recommend his work to anyone looking for a great plumber!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Steven Catchings
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Did good work and the work was reasonably priced. He was very punctual and was also willing to give me some advice on other issues I was going to fix. I recommend him to anyone with plumbing issues.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Monica Hudson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Harris County Plumbing is punctual, professional and does top notch work.

We had a plumbing emergency on Memorial weekend,  and thought we wouldn't be able to find someone to come out.  HCP was at our house within 30 minutes of calling, applied a temporary fix and them resolved the issue first thing Memorial day.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Harris County Plumbing

aboutUs: Harris County Plumbing is a trusted local plumbing company serving communities across Alabama. Our team of highly skilled and certified professionals specializes in a wide range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and emergency services. We take pride in our expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to delivering exceptional results for every project.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a reliable and knowledgeable plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for emergencies, ensuring your plumbing issues are addressed promptly.
Comprehensive solutions tailored to your specific needs, backed by our team's extensive training and expertise.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, so you know exactly what to expect before any work begins.
